pullrequest.title: Add ArrangePlugin to arrange models for tasks

content.raw:
I just added an arrangement in 544d1f44453f that will stack the boxes. I noticed that the contact behavior is a bit erratic, so I've made a pull request to update the contact parameters for the wood models:

#!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/87/fix-contact-parameters-for-wood-blocks/diff
